recipesJson.name: Best Blue Raspberry
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a simple, easy to make Blue Raspberry Recipe

Made for Flavorbook Entry "LB Blue Raspberry"
-> https://diyordievaping.com/2018/06/29/lb-blue-raspberry/

reviews.text: Tried this and there is a hint of Blue Raz but I mostly get a burnt taste.  Not a good mix at all.
